channel.title: Databases :: CIS 526 Textbook
channel.description: As we suggested in the previous section, using an already existing database application is a very common strategy for full-stack web development. Doing so has clear benefits - such programs are typically stable, secure, and optimized for data storage and retrieval. They are well beyond what we can achieve ourselves without a significant investment of time, and avoids the necessity of “reinventing the wheel”. That said, making effective use of a third-party database system does require you to develop familiarity with how the database operates and is organized.
